column5: Any one lucky enough or rich enough to get tickets? Good seats are going for 800-1000 EACH.For 1 ticket you can get a week in the Islands or 2 days with Thorpie.I would take the week.but Thorpie is a close second. WAY WAY out of hand
yeah more then this poor boy can afford  I can barely afford to watch it on PPV for free...LOL

I can't wait!!! Managed to get 2 tickets in the upper bowl for under $200 through ticketmaster.  I watched the news conference and Dana White said it's going to be the largest UFC EVER....around 22,000 screaming for St.Pierre.  It's going to be insane!!!!!!  Floor seats were $550...now going for $1600-$1900...insane or what?
I'm going. 5th row on the floor! Also got 3rd row on the floor for next months UFC in Columbus!

took a look at the prices for the tickets yesterday, 100 level tickets @ $400 a piece..  add in a hotel room for a couple nights.. plus "entertainment"..  dont think i could sneak that one past the wife...
Heck.. I wish they'd reopen the Brule' Hotel in Penetang. I could watch better than UFC, for free, on any Friday night.... after the "island folks" cashed their Goverment cheques at the bar.

Ill be watching it at home...  PPV with 53 inch widescreen, wings, beer and the wife... best seats in the house.. I would like to get to one of the events live though.. that would be really cool.. too bad I already spent my 2 g's on cuba in april...
have a buddy fighting trying tog et down... but FLorida is two weeks later. getting a week in FLorida pass was hard enough
I'll be there if all goes well. 13,000+ plus tickets were sold in the first 24 hours, it's going to be a great fight!!!
